verses.verse: And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, stand <WH5975> <WH8798> upon thy feet <WH7272>, and I will speak <WH1696> <WH8762> unto thee.

And the spirit <WH7307> entered <WH935> <WH8799> into me when he spake <WH1696> <WH8765> unto me, and set <WH5975> <WH8686> me upon my feet <WH7272>, that I heard <WH8085> <WH8799> him that spake <WH1696> <WH8693> unto me.

And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, I send <WH7971> <WH8802> thee to the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, to a rebellious <WH4775> <WH8802> nation <WH1471> that hath rebelled <WH4775> <WH8804> against me: they and their fathers <WH1> have transgressed <WH6586> <WH8804> against me, even unto this very <WH6106> day <WH3117>.

For they are impudent <WH7186> <WH6440> children <WH1121> and stiffhearted <WH2389> <WH3820>. I do send <WH7971> <WH8802> thee unto them; and thou shalt say <WH559> <WH8804> unto them, Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>.

And they, whether they will hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, or whether they will forbear <WH2308> <WH8799>, (for they are a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>,) yet shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> that there hath been a prophet <WH5030> among <WH8432> them.

And thou, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, be not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of them, neither be afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of their words <WH1697>, though briers <WH5621> and tshofars <WH5544> be with thee, and thou dost dwell <WH3427> <WH8802> among scorpions <WH6137>: be not afraid <WH3372> <WH8799> of their words <WH1697>, nor be dismayed <WH2865> <WH8735> at their looks <WH6440>, though they be a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>.
And thou shalt speak <WH1696> <WH8765> my words <WH1697> unto them, whether they will hear <WH8085> <WH8799>, or whether they will forbear <WH2308> <WH8799>: for they are most rebellious <WH4805>.

But thou, son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, hear <WH8085> <WH8798> what I say <WH1696> <WH8764> unto thee; Be not <WH1961> <WH8799> thou rebellious <WH4805> like that rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>: open <WH6475> <WH8798> thy mouth <WH6310>, and eat <WH398> <WH8798> that I give <WH5414> <WH8802> thee.
And when I looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, behold, an hand <WH3027> was sent <WH7971> <WH8803> unto me; and, lo, a roll <WH4039> of a book <WH5612> was therein;

And he spread <WH6566> <WH8799> it before <WH6440> me; and it was written <WH3789> <WH8803> within <WH6440> and without <WH268>: and there was written <WH3789> <WH8803> therein lamentations <WH7015>, and mourning <WH1899>, and woe <WH1958>.
